Ensure student journalism survives PERIOD Donate today PERIOD

By  Peter BoskeyOctober  

Being on campus a lot of freestyling can be heard in the strangest places  in front of DuSable Hall Grant Towers elevators and even public bathrooms PERIOD Well heres a challenge for all you rappersartists PERIOD

Henkel Consumer Adhesives Inc. makers of the famous Duck brand Duct Tape are having a contest to find a song that literally sticks. it is the first annual Duck brand duct tape Rock About the Roll Contest. solo artists duos and bands are all encouraged to send in an original song about Duct Tape PERIOD Entrants have the chance to win a variety of prizes including the first place prize of  cash PERIOD

Spectacular says Andrew Lanthrum a junior business major and songwritermusician PERIOD Well put together a band for that. lanthrums roommate Jon Wolff a sophomore undecided major and musician agreed and said he will write a song called Duct Tape Rocks Because Its Sticky. contest participants are expected to send in a song about duct tape with original music and lyrics along with a photograph PERIOD The song must be submitted on a CD as a .WAV file or as an MP3 file PERIOD The winners will be chosen based on a number of factors including creativity musical skill originality of the lyrics and references to duct tape PERIOD

The Duck brand Duct Tape Rock About the Roll Contest will award the first place winner  cash second place  cash and third place  cash PERIOD Ten lucky honorable mention winners will receive a years supply of duct tape valued at  PERIOD You could fix anything with that amount of tape PERIOD

Forget the first and second prize says William Vigliotti a junior communication major and lyricist were talking a year supply of Duct tape

The winners will ultimately be decided by a panel of judges selected by Henkel Consumer Adhesives Inc PERIOD All entries must be received no later than Dec PERIOD   PERIOD The winners will be notified the week of Dec PERIOD  and posted on the Web site the following week PERIOD The original songs will be available for listening during the contest at www.ducktapeclub.com PERIOD Official rules can be found at the site PERIOD
